_header: He that is all-wielding hath taken a little inn
Subjects: Christ, Incarnation of; sermons, verse in
_description: Miracles of the Incarnation — three long lines (aaa)

StPauls9Dxix.Transcription:
He þat is all weldyng haþ takyn a lytul InÞo kyng of
                    paradys is komen of sempul kynA mayde kepyng here maydynhod a chyld today
                    haþ boryn
